summary: Some time ago I did this gown for my female character. I know it's rather not totally lore friendly but still I hope you'll have some fun with it .
descriptionHtml:
*** UPDATE ***

1.1-beta NEW SILVER AND GOLD TEXTURES AVAILABLE FOR UNP
1.0-beta NOW BOTH UNP AND CBBE BASED MODELS AVAILABLE IN BETA

THIS MOD IS A BETA - FULL VERSION COMING SOON

If you like it please ENDORSE :)

1. Description:

Some time ago I did this gown for my female character. I know it's rather not totally lore friendly (skyrim isn't happening in the 17th century ;) ) but still I hope you'll have some fun with it .
CBBE based only.


2. Known issues:

- the weights on the skirt are not fine-tuned yet so in some poses it may act weird
- female only
- minor clipping problems may occur
- there's no weightslider
- to avoid handseams turn the weightslider way down


3. How to get it in game:

- type in console "help 1660", you will get all needed IDs.
- type in console "player.additem XXX Y". XXX means necessary ID, Y means count of items you want.

4. Installation:

- I suggest using MO or NMM you can also extract the package manually.


5. Uninstallation:

- again I suggest using MO or NMM or you can remove the .esp file and mod's folders


6. Terms of use:

-You are not allowed to reupload this mod to other sites without permission. 
-You have to ask me first if you want to use any part of this mod in your own such as follower mod, mashup mod, etc.
-You have to ask me first if you want to convert the outfit to other bodies.
-You have to ask me first if you want to recolor/retexture the outfit.
-You are not allowed to publicily share any your modification of this mod, private sharing is allowed.
-You are not allowed to convert this outfit to other games.

If you have any questions please ask.


Credits:

- all parts of the armor are modelled from the scratch by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11770218/?]kozakowy[/url]
- thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6565535/?]Before The Automobile[/url] for loads of inspiration.
- the armlets used in the shots are part of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007]zzjay[/url]﻿'s work.
- the jewelery seen in the shots is availeable at [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/]Stealthic Khaos[/url]﻿'s site.
author: Kozakowy
